name: Shattered (itch) (Menmastirfry)
description:
Shattered is a student-made, single player first person perspective psychological horror & puzzle solving game. 

Controls:

Movement: WASD

Rotate Views: Mouse Hover

Inventory System: E

Role:

Yi Ning - Producer

Yizhe Wu - Lead Artist

Lizhou Cai - Lead Programmer

Yinjie Wu - Programmer, Sound Design

Jiayao Zhu - Designer

Keegan Dant - Programmer
